_header: Abstinence from wickedness and forsaking of sin
_description: A verse tag in a collection of sermons by John Waldeby — three monorhyming lines

BodLauMis77.Transcription:
Abstinens fro wikkudnes & forsakynge of sinnekepyng of þe
                    comawndementis in wiche lyue is inneSuffryng wrong wyth paciens & so
                    hewn to wynne
